text: Our experience was great! Chris is very communicative and responsable. We will use his services again.

On time, professional, clean, and friendly! Also communicates well in regards to the weather, delivery time, and gave thorough explanations on how to handle equipment (generator, popcorn machine, etc) I would definitely use again!

Amazing service! These guys know how to make party magic with clean, updated equipment! They were prepared, at the drop of a dime, to tackle any obstacle I could throw at them including: tables/chairs, margarita machines, and even a generator! Super competitive pricing too! Chris and his crew are the ones you can count on for quality, punctuality, service, and safety! Thank you once again for the awesomely exceptional experience! We’ll definitely be using SATX BOUNCE for our next magical party!

SATX Bounce and Chris made this party extra special! The bouncy house was a hit with the kids. Chris was friendly, reliable and easy to do business with. I highly recommend using SATX bounce for your next party.
We rented the tropical bounce house and some tables/chairs. The equipment was practically brand new and in very good condition. The owner came to set it up and was very nice. Communication was great!

Chris is very professional and went above and beyond for us when we found out we rented to small of a bounce house. He brought us another one in less than 30 minutes he was great out children had a blast. Thank you

Absolutely amazing! Chris got to the venue 10 minutes early- waited on me (I was 10 minutes late) and was exactly on time for pick up. The bounce was a hit with the kids! All together we had an amazing experience and will reach out the next time we need any inflatables in San Antonio.
Chris was great , was able to rent one on short notice and he was flexible with thr pickup time as well. Definitely recommended renting from here for your event.
Quality bounce house, clearly well taken care of. Chris was professional, prompt and communicative. We had an excellent experience - will recommend to friends and use again in the future.

From start to finish our experience with SATX Bounce was amazing. Chris was friendly and helpful, making the whole process super easy. The bounce house was clean and new, and he went over all the safety information with us. We will definitely use them for any future events!

SATX Bounce was a pleasure to work with! They were quick, communicative, and very easy to work with during our event. They offered flexibility and great options to meet our budget. We would love to work with them again in the future. I have already recommended them to others!

I had an even for 1000 plus people this past week and we had a great experience. Communication was top notch. They double checked all details, let us know eta’s, and checked in to see how everything was going. They were very professional and on time. I would easily recommending them to anyone! We will be using them again.
best experience ever !!! doesn’t disappoint love it!
Great service and quick to reply!
Amazing service and fast replying! 10/10!

Chris, the owner, was extremely friendly and easy to work with, and he worked with our party schedule to make sure we'd have it even though he had other parties to set up for the same day. He made sure it was set up safely, and the kids had a blast on the bounce house! Overall, renting from SATX Bounce was a very pleasant, low-stress experience, and I would definitely recommend them.
Great professional team. Responded to my request online within minutes, was very efficient with setup and removal. Kids loved the bounce house. Would definitely use their service again in the future.
Chris was communicative and punctual, making our event stress free! Excellent prices and a nice selection of rentals as well.

Highly recommend SATX Bounce House Rentals!! Every part of the process went smoothly, from signing up (and receiving a call right after) to the set up process on the day of the party. Easiest and most convenient service I have ever received! Chris is very polite, communicative, and trustworthy! I couldn’t have chosen a better company to do business with.

We will continue to use SATX Bounce for all of family events. Very professional throughout the entire transaction and will be also be returning to utilize SATX Bounce for PTA events we sponsor. Thank you again!

Responsive, reliable, and affordable. Great experience with SATX Bounce. Chris was very quick to reply to my inquiry and responsive via text from the time of booking through pick up. Combo bouncer was perfect for our event and price was great. Would definitely rent again from this company in the future.
Very easy process of getting a bounce house for my son's birthday. Chris communicated through every step and we will definitely be using his bounce houses for future parties!

Cannot speak highly enough about SATX bounce!! From the moment I inquired online, to pick up. When I reached out online, Chris the owner got in touch with me within 30 minutes. The bouncer I originally thought of, sadly was booked up but thankfully he has such a wide variety of options! He was so generous and came to measure our yard because I feared our small yard couldn't accommodate a bigger bounce house - but thankfully I was wrong! 😂 he even recommended a better option based on age group and heat index! The kids had such an amazing time and it will forever be a core memory. I actually reached out to Chris a few hours before or origin pickup time and was able to schedule more time because of how much of a hit it was! His flexibility, communication, and inventory is TOP NOTCH. Didn't even require a deposit up front which I really appreciated after being burned by other companies. Recommend 100% to anyone looking to rent in the future.
Will definitely be using them for my sons future events, great pricing, nice family business and very fast and organized
10 out of 10. I’m a repeat customer of SATX Bounce. They provide stress-free and timely service.

Chris is such a great guy. We had a wonderful party because of our rental. Chris was very knowledgeable in helping us select the right type and size of bouncy house for our event. The kids absolutely loved it. He was very accommodating and worked with us. I will CERTAINLY go to him for all my needs for bouncy houses (I have young children so there will be many parties coming up). Thank you again Chris!
Responds to inquiries quickly, friendly and very kind. Absolutely would recommend and can’t wait till our next event. Thank you SATXBOUNCE!!

Only a week before the 4th of July, I reached out to see if there were any rentals available. Chris responded quickly and locked in the slide we wanted and gave us a generous amount of time for the rental. The day of the party, he helped point out where the best place to set up was and got the slide up quickly. Even with all the rentals during the busy holiday, he made sure we were set up safely and set our expectations high before leaving. We finished earlier than planned and Chris was able to come sooner to start packing up. Having used rentals before that required us to pickup, setup, pack, and return all in the same day made SATX Bounce’s delivery and pickup service model so much better. Chris has phenomenal customer service, quick response time, and was available for any questions before, during, and after our rental. Everyone loved the slide and the service provided by Chris made it easy for me as the renter. I have no hesitations renting again from Chris and he has set the bar extremely high!

SATX Bounce House Rentals is an excellent choice for your party. Chris is truly helpful to make your party so much less stressful. Will continue to use his service for future events. He truly works with you for your event, goes above and beyond! Thank you Chris and your son for all the help!
10 out of 10
I highly recommend SATX bounce. We rented the tables and chairs only but Chris was absolutely amazing with communication, promptness, and professionalism! Reasonable prices with quality products.

AWESOME! AWESOME! AWESOME! My friend and I planned a surprise graduation party that required a bounce house and Chris came to the rescue! Chris was spot on with his customer service, reply time, and delivery/pick up. My friends and I had the BEST time and Chris ensured that we did. Thank you so much for your time and assistance. It made the day perfect!

We hired SATX Bounce for our elementary school 5th grade party event and everything went so smoothly! He was easy to communicate with and prices were very reasonable. He was on time and professional. We had 2 bouncy houses and the basketball hoop. The kids (and staff) had a blast. We will use them again!

Very professional service with affordable prices. Chris was on time in arriving and picking up equipment. Made sure the bounce house was tied and secured before leaving. Definitely will use his services again.

5 Stars all around! One of the best interactions with a vendor I've had. Chris was punctual and courteous through the entire process, Got the bounce house to me on time and set it up and broke it down with no issues at all. Everyone at the church festival had a blast! If your looking for an event highlight that is affordable with great service weather it be a bounce house or a water slide, SATX Bounce is the place to go!
Very reasonable price and great communication. Highly recommend.

Chris is awesome! He is very punctual, responsive, and very quick at the setup and breakdown. They have a variety of choices and their prices are very reasonable. The kids always have a great time. I been renting from them since they started and will continue to go through them! Thanks again for providing an awesome bounce house!

Just had our bouncy house and snow cone machine picked up and it went so well! The rentals were delivered on time and set-up quickly. All went as planned and we were very happy with everything. The items were clean and well taken care of, which was important to us. Thank you, Chris for providing such a great time to my 7 grandchildren and even a couple of the adults had fun! Will most definitely rent again from SATX Bounce again!

What great service. Chris and his awesome helper Ben did a great job setting up and making me feel prepared for our birthday party. My daughter and her friends had a great time and the equipment worked perfectly. Chris also went above and beyond to help me find a last minute "Unicorn" which was magic for my daughter. I highly recommend his service!
SATX bounce house was top tier . They did not disappoint. The delivery an set up was was timeless. Payment was very versatile and non-expensive. We will definitely be renting again .
Best jumpy house rental we’ve ever had! Will use again.

SATX Bounce is one of the best party rental businesses in San Antonio! Chris was super helpful and stayed in contact with any and all questions and his 6yo son Benny was too cute and made sure the bounce house was bouncy enough for my daughters party. They have lots of bounce houses to choose from even have a popcorn or cotton candy machine! Definitely will be calling for our next birthday party.

Thanks to SATX Bounce, ordering a bounce house was the easiest part of planning my most recent party. Within minutes of submitting my request, I received a call to get a quote. There were no surprise fees as the prices on the website are what you will be charged. The pricing was the most affordable compared to other rental services in the area and the customer service was even better. I will definitely be using SATX Bounce for all my future events!
We received excellent customer service from Chris. The equipment was clean, in great condition, and delivered on time. I would definitely rent from SATX Bounce again.
The service was AWESOME. Chris went above and beyond, helping us out with our tables and chairs. We will being using SATX Bounce for our bounce house, tables and chairs needs.
Great communication, quick replies, quick set up and the kids had a great time. Will be calling again soon. Thank you for the experience I can't wait to make more!
Clear communication, fair prices, and super easy setup and takedown. Highly recommend for bouncy castle and party supply rentals!

As soon as I put in an inquiry I was called back. He updated me throughout the whole process. He set it up quickly and wrapped it up just as quickly. I am incredibly grateful for the service. My daughter had a blast for her birthday! Thank you!

Excellent service provided. Honest hard working individuals.
Quick response, one price, no up charges or extra fees.

Oh my gosh....this company was fantastic to work with. Communicated really well at every step. The bounce house we had for a birthday party kept the kids entertained the entire time!!! I highly recommend them and we will be using them again in the future!!!
Awesome job it was a great obstacle course excellent conditions the kids had so much fun great srrvice
Great company an person to deal with! Awesomely professional, with generous amount personality mixed in. Was there exactly on time. Recommend this be your next bounce house amusement rental!
Extremely professional and flexible. On time (to the minute) with delivery and pick up. Bounce house was in great condition.
Set up was 👏 Amazing, kids had such a great time and take down was right on time. I would totally recommend this company for my future events.
We absolutely enjoyed renting with Chris. Chris and his son are very polite and super quick at their job. We are super thankful to find a great place to rent from, we plan to rent for future events.

I hired SATX bounce for an Oktoberfest event and they completely delivered! Chris was punctual, professional, and incredibly kind. The kids loved the bounce house and he took care of everything- I didn't have to lift a finger. I completely recommend SATX bounce to anyone interested in a good time. Chris if you're reading this-thank you again!

We have used them twice now and have had such great communication, best prices, and the nicest business personalities I have ever had to deal with in San Antonio!! Don’t look anywhere else, choose SATX!!

It was a couple months ago when I rented from SATX Bounce and I’m just now getting to the review, but this is the place to rent for your party needs. Prompt delivery and set up, directions explained to the T, prompt pickup and was an overall great and AFFORDABLE experience, will definitely use again and recommend to all my friends, 5 stars, 10/10, 100%!

10/10 recommend! Great price especially considering we had it from 8am - 8pm! Owners were the nicest and Quality Control Manager (little Benny) was absolutely adorable. Thank you for making my son’s 3rd birthday unforgettable!

SATX Bounce is the best party & bouncy house rental service in San Antonio and surrounding areas. Chris, the owner, is a fantastic communicator- transparent and reliable. Definitely someone you want as your go-to party liaison. Great work

Me and my wife jazmyne highly recommend satx bounce omg I can not brag more than the communication the honesty the purity of respect we also can’t brag enough of the water slide as well the kids literally jumped and slid every minute every second lol but overall they are the best!!!!!!!
Highly recommend. Super friendly and easy to book. Easy transitions and zero hassle.

Chris was so amazing. He set up and took down in no time at all. He even entertained my very curious kids with explanations and stories while he was doing it. Would happily rent from this business again.

I cannot thank SATX Bounce enough for the great experience we had. The water slide was the only way the kids could Absolutely Enjoy an outdoor party in this heat. They had a great time and the service was above and beyond. Very punctual, clean and courteous. Thanks a million!!
SATX Bounce was best bouncy house rental I have experienced. I highly recommend them for best prices and quality service.
Chris was very respectful and professional would highly recommend to anyone looking for this type of service.
Had a very quick response time and very professional throughout. Would definitely recommend.
Excellent, friendly service from Chris at SATX Bounce. Would definitely recommend this business to anyone looking for bounce rentals.

Chris & SATX Bounce came thru last minute, especially with the weather change he was very accommodating. Great communication, very professional, punctual & a local neighbor. We will definitely be using them again! My kids had a blast on the dry slide! Looking to rent the water slide next.

SATX Bounce is awesome!!!Chris is incredible, very punctual and professional. Rented jumping ballon’s for my children’s school function they and completely made our day!!  Loved working with them and will definitely use them for future events. Thank you for all the smiles you brought to our school today ! ! !

Working with Chris and SA Bounce was the easiest process.  I found them by pure luck and I am so happy I did.  He responded to my inquiry on line right away. Unfortunately, we had to reschedule our birthday party due to weather but it was no problem for Chris. Once we had our party, he showed up on time. Him and his wife are very pleasant and super fast setting everything up.  The bounce house was clean and smelled fresh!!  Not like feet or sweat like some can. The kids had a blast and the adult kids had just as much fun in it too!!  When it came time for pick up, once again he was on time and take down was just as fast.  We will 100% be renting from them again and HIGHLY recommend them!!

SATX Bounce was AMAZING!!!! Chris came on time and set up in a timely manner for the event, and the same with clean up. He was very professional and respectful and answered all my questions. I do plan to use his service in the near future!!!! THANK YOU CHRIS!!!!
